title: USN change journalto
extract: An Update Sequence Number (USN) Journal is a change journal of file and directory changes on the NTFS volume including a description of the change, and the name of the file or directory. Each log file is incremented for each entry in the journal. Log files are stored until they are deleted or storage runs out.
extract_html: An Update Sequence Number (USN) Journal is a change journal of file and directory changes on the NTFS volume including a description of the change, and the name of the file or directory. Each log file is incremented for each entry in the journal. Log files are stored until they are deleted or storage runs out.
